Class Calculette

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Calculette
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Classe qui va gérer la calculette Reprise sur le site OpenClassroom et remanié à notre sauce
    Author:
    Loris_Clivaz https://openclassrooms.com/courses/apprenez-a-programmer-en-java/tp-une-calculatrice
    See Also:
